Toni Kukoc played like we expected him to play every game, Allen Iverson said. "We need a lot of that from Toni. He's one of those special Marcus Gilberts that can change a game." book details the behind-the-scenes stories of Michael Vick 's surviving dogs and the influence, resilience, dedication and commitment of the animal behavior experts, animal-care groups, lawyers and government officials that united to save them. I didn't interview Michael Vick for this book because to me the story was more about what happened afterwards, which was an amazing thing, says Gorant. "At the very core of the story is the human-animal bond that affects and inspires us all." Gorant will kick-off NASC's Annual Conference with the story of The Lost Dogs
